review: I'm going to get a couple more - these little devices are allowing me to cut the cord just a little more; I'm removing extra cable connections and replacing the old cable boxes with these.I would love it if Discovery channels were available on ANY internet TV device, but I won't hold my breath.  I still need to use cable for those (Discovery, Science, Velocity, etc.).
author: Joubert

review: Awesome.  Liked it much better than my Google Chromecast, though they are different application.  I installed it on my internet-enabled TV (Sony Bravia), but the Amazon video interface is so much better than the Sony-supplied Amazon app that I never looked back.  The wifi transfer also feels perceptibly faster, and the menu navigation is much snappier.  And the RF remote is genius, I took the habit of just holding us under my blanket and use it by touch alone.  Before, I used to watch 1-2 hours/day of DVR'd DirectTV, now, it's like Amazon prime every other day including most of week-end watching.
author: Minh D. Nguyen "Minh"
